A lot, a lot smoked. I think generally most people, you know, even, you know, I started
smoking there, you know, I mean I don't smoke now, but that's where, you know, you'd sit
down with patients and it would be a way of communicating and I think we smoked, you know,
in offices like this office we're sitting in now, I think back now. It was almost like
a given. Most of my colleagues smoked and most of the patients smoked. There was a hospital
shop. No, you could actually go and buy five at a time, you know, and that used to open
on a Wednesday afternoon or maybe a Saturday afternoon.
